description: Steuben's Food Truck is recreating American Regional Classics. Looking for something new and different from the Steuben’s Truck this season? Well, you’re in luck! This year Pearl will be turning into a “Test Kitchen” for both the Steuben’s & Vesta chefs to try out new things that you may or may not see in either restaurant! These specials will be limited and not available daily so be sure to come by to find out when we have them. Some of our customer favorites you’ll be seeing regularly are our Cubano, Cheesesteak, Maine Lobster Roll & Fries, Grilled Cheese with Tomato Soup, and the Chicago Dog.
name: Steuben's Food Truck
